General.Name: Jilin Liyuan Precision Manufacturing Co Ltd
General.Description: Jilin Liyuan Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aluminum alloy products in China. The company offers bumpers, battery boxes, door and window profiles, curtain walls, rail car material, aluminum rod and tube, equipment bracket, solar borde, heat sink, and laptop case, as well as laptop shell, smartphone trays, radiator products, oil drill, seamless tube, etc. It provides aluminum deep processing products; car bodies and containers; bars and pipes; and tempered, insulating, laminated, bulletproof, and fireproof glass, as well as water conservancy projects, I-shaped aluminum, and flyovers and three-dimensional parking garages. The company products are used in auto parts, building decoration, rail transit, solar energy, electronic power, aviation, and petrochemical industries. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Jilin Liyuan Aluminum Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jilin Liyuan Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. in November 2013. Jilin Liyuan Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Liaoyuan, China.

4.Name: Haibin  Yu
